p: Polyphenols have been known for their potential of targeting protein kinases via interacting with the ATP-binding sites ( Guerra and Issinger, 2019). Hispolon inhibited NPC cell metastasis by downregulating Akt signaling pathway ( Ho et al., 2017). Hispolon treatment leads toward increased phosphorylation of p38 MAPK, JNK and ERK1/2 in HONE-1 and NPC-039Â cells ( Hsieh et al., 2018).
